title: I Have A Odd Problum
body:
my email was shut down by microsoft i cant get into it so can you maunly change my email to the gmail i just set up? if you can ty if you cant im boned. 

-Demon746

replies.body: ok i go to my gmail and try to look at the tikket and it says it is not there

You can write a support ticket into us using [this form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Fill out as much information as you can recall about your account and make sure to mention what you did here in your post.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Riot won't do this, you have to do it yourself. You could be a hijacker requesting a change and they will not follow through with this.

> [{quoted}](name=TwinkiePro,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WuiG8aEl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-29T21:46:28.705+0000)
>
> Riot won't do this, you have to do it yourself. You could be a hijacker requesting a change and they will not follow through with this.

RIP im fucked then 
XD
